xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
export.pdf.options.template=Template export.pdf.options.template.hint=The PDF template controls the information displayed on the cover page, in the table of contents as well as in the header and footer of each page. export.pdf.options.loadFailure=Failed to load the PDF export options.
export.pdf.modal.close=Close export.pdf.inProgress=Exporting... export.pdf.failed=Failed to export as PDF
export.pdf.templates.default=Default template export.pdf.templates.default.versionInfo=Version {0} authored by {1} on {2} export.pdf.template.name=PDF Template export.pdf.template.hint=Template used by PDF export export.pdf.template.provider=PDF Template Provider export.pdf.template.skinExtensionInfo=The CSS and JavaScript skin extensions provided by this page are also part of the PDF template and thus are loaded automatically when the PDF template is used.
admin.export.pdf=PDF Export admin.export.pdf.description=Configure how wiki pages are exported to PDF.
XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover=Cover XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover.hint=The information displayed on the first page. E.g. the title and the author XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc=Table of Contents XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc.hint=Usually lists the content headings along with their page numbers. XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header=Header XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header.hint=The information displayed at the top of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the title XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer=Footer XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer.hint=The information displayed at the bottom of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the number of the page
XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates=Templates XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates.hint=The list of PDF templates the user can select from when exporting wiki pages to PDF.
